General.Name: Zhejiang Oceanking Development Co Ltd
General.Description: Zhejiang Oceanking Development Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, production, and sale of chlor-alkali-related products. It offers liquid caustic soda; liquid alkali, liquid chlorine, chlorinated paraffin, sodium hypochlorite, hydrochloric acid, and hydrogen chloride gas; and methyl isobutyl ketone, diisobutyl ketone, and methyl isobutyl ketone products. Zhejiang Oceanking Development Co., Ltd. was incorporated in 2004 and is based in Ningbo, China.
General.Address: No. 655, Haitian Middle Road, Ningbo, China, 315204
